institutions.name: The Virgin Islands Children's Museum
institutions.address: 6100 Estate Smith Bay, St. Thomas, VI 00802

institutions.name: The Children's Museum of St. Croix
institutions.address: 52 Company Street, Christiansted, St. Croix, VI 00820
institutions.description: An interactive learning space for children featuring hands-on exhibits focused on Caribbean culture, marine ecology, and creative play. The museum offers educational programs and activities designed specifically for young visitors in the St. Croix community.
